title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.

Using the internet for social or personal interests is higher than any other categories with value 51.0, followed by Watching television (any device), and Reading newspapers (either printed or online). Down to category Listening to the radio (any format/device) with the lowest value of 12.0.
The highest value at Using the internet for social or personal interests is almost 4.25 times larger than the minimum value of Listening to the radio (any format/device).
The highest value at Using the internet for social or personal interests is almost 4.25 times larger than the minimum value of Listening to the radio (any format/device).
The difference between the max Response Using the internet for social or personal interests and min Response Listening to the radio (any format/device) is 39.0.
